verses.verse: And <S%G2532><s%> When <S%G3753><s%> They Drew Near <S%G1448><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> Jerusalem, <S%G2419><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> Bethphage <S%G967><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Bethany, <S%G963><s%> Towards <S%G4314><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Mount <S%G3735><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of Olives, <S%G1636><s%> He Sends <S%G649><s%> Two <S%G1417><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3101><s%> Of His Disciples, <S%G846><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Says <S%G3004><s%> To Them, <S%G846><s%> Go <S%G5217><s%> Into <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Village, <S%G2968><s%> <S%G3588><s%> That Opposite <S%G2713><s%> You, <S%G5216><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Immediately <S%G2112><s%> Entering <S%G1531><s%> Into <S%G1519><s%> It <S%G846><s%> Ye Will Find <S%G2147><s%> A Colt <S%G4454><s%> Tied, <S%G1210><s%> ' Upon <S%G1909><s%> Which <S%G3739><s%> No One <S%G3762><s%> Of Men <S%G444><s%> Has Sat : <S%G2523><s%> Having Loosed <S%G3089><s%> It <S%G846><s%> Lead It. <S%G71><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> If <S%G1437><s%> Anyone <S%G5100><s%> To You <S%G5213><s%> Say, <S%G2036><s%> Why <S%G5101><s%> Do Ye <S%G4160><s%> This? <S%G5124><s%> <S%G2036><s%> Say, <S%G3754><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%> Of It <S%G846><s%> Need <S%G5532><s%> Has, <S%G2192><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Immediately <S%G2112><s%> It <S%G846><s%> He Will Send <S%G649><s%> Hither. <S%G5602><s%>

<S%G565><s%> And They Departed, <S%G1161><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Found <S%G2147><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Colt <S%G4454><s%> Tied <S%G1210><s%> At <S%G4314><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Door <S%G2374><s%> Without, <S%G1854><s%> By <S%G1909><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Cross Way, <S%G296><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> They Loose <S%G3089><s%> It. <S%G846><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Some <S%G5100><s%> Of Those <S%G3588><s%> There <S%G1563><s%> Standing <S%G2476><s%> Said <S%G3004><s%> To Them, <S%G846><s%> What <S%G5101><s%> Are Ye Doing <S%G4160><s%> Loosing <S%G3089><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Colt? <S%G4454><s%>

<S%G3588><s%> And They <S%G1161><s%> Said <S%G2036><s%> To Them <S%G846><s%> As <S%G2531><s%> Commanded <S%G1781><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Jesus. <S%G2424><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> They Allowed <S%G863><s%> Them. <S%G846><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> They Led <S%G71><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Colt <S%G4454><s%> To <S%G4314><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Jesus. <S%G2424><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> They Cast Upon <S%G1911><s%> It <S%G846><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2440><s%> Their Garments, <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> He Sat <S%G2523><s%> ' On <S%G1909><s%> It : <S%G846><s%>

<S%G4183><s%> And Many <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2440><s%> Their Garments <S%G846><s%> Strewed <S%G4766><s%> On <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Way, <S%G3598><s%> <S%G243><s%> And Others <S%G1161><s%> Branches <S%G4746><s%> Were Cutting Down <S%G2875><s%> From <S%G1537><s%> The <S%G3588><s%>, Trees, <S%G1186><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Were Strewing Them <S%G4766><s%> On <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Way. <S%G3598><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Those <S%G3588><s%> Going Before <S%G4254><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Those <S%G3588><s%> Following <S%G190><s%> Were Crying Out, <S%G2896><s%>, Saying, <S%G3004><s%> Hosanna! <S%G5614><s%> Blessed Be <S%G2127><s%> He Who <S%G3588><s%> Comes <S%G2064><s%> In The <S%G1722><s%> Name <S%G3686><s%> Of The Lord. <S%G2962><s%>

Blessed Be <S%G2127><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Coming <S%G2064><s%> Kingdom <S%G932><s%> In The <S%G1722><s%> Name <S%G3686><s%>, Of The Lord <S%G2962><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3962><s%> Of Our Father <S%G2257><s%> David. <S%G1138><s%> Hosanna <S%G5614><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Highest! <S%G5310><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Entered <S%G1525><s%> Into <S%G1519><s%> Jerusalem <S%G2414><s%> <S%G3588><s%>, Jesus <S%G2424><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Into <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Temple; <S%G2411><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Having Looked Round On <S%G4017><s%> All Things, <S%G3956><s%> Late <S%G3798><s%> Already <S%G2235><s%> Being <S%G5607><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Hour, <S%G5610><s%> He Went Out <S%G1831><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> Bethany <S%G963><s%> With <S%G3326><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Twelve. <S%G1427><s%>
And <S%G2532><s%> On The <S%G3588><s%> Morrow <S%G1887><s%> Having Gone Out <S%G1831><s%> They <S%G846><s%> From <S%G575><s%> Bethany, <S%G963><s%> He Hungered. <S%G3983><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Seeing <S%G1492><s%> A Fig Tree <S%G4808><s%> Afar Off <S%G3113><s%> Having <S%G2192><s%> Leaves, <S%G5444><s%> He Went <S%G2064><s%> If <S%G1487><s%> Perhaps <S%G686><s%> He Will Find <S%G2147><s%> Anything <S%G5100><s%> On <S%G1722><s%> It. <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Having Come <S%G2064><s%> ' To <S%G1909><s%> It, <S%G846><s%> Nothing <S%G3762><s%> <S%G2147><s%> He Found <S%G1487><s%> Except <S%G3361><s%> Leaves, <S%G5444><s%> <S%G3756><s%> <S%G1063><s%> For It Was Not The <S%G2258><s%> Season <S%G2540><s%> Of Figs. <S%G4810><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Answering <S%G611><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Said <S%G2036><s%> To It, <S%G846><s%> No More <S%G3371><s%> Of <S%G1537><s%> Thee <S%G4675><s%> For <S%G1519><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Ever <S%G165><s%> Any One (lit. No One) <S%G3367><s%> Fruit <S%G2590><s%> Let Eat. <S%G5315><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Heard <S%G191><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Disciples <S%G3101><s%> His. <S%G846><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> They Come <S%G2064><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> Jerusalem; <S%G2414><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Having Entered <S%G1525><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Into <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Temple <S%G2411><s%> He Began <S%G756><s%> To Cast Out <S%G1544><s%> Those <S%G3588><s%> Selling <S%G4453><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Buying <S%G59><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Temple, <S%G2411><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Tables <S%G5132><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Money Changers <S%G2855><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Seats <S%G2515><s%> Of Those <S%G3588><s%> Selling <S%G4453><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Doves <S%G4058><s%> He Overthrew, <S%G2690><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3756><s%> Suffered Not <S%G863><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> Anyone <S%G5100><s%> Should Carry <S%G1308><s%> A Vessel <S%G4632><s%> Through <S%G1223><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Temple. <S%G2411><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> He Taught, <S%G1321><s%> Saying <S%G3004><s%>, To Them, <S%G846><s%> Not <S%G3756><s%> <S%G1125><s%> Has It Been Written, <S%G3754><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3624><s%> My House <S%G3450><s%> A House <S%G3624><s%> Of Prayer <S%G4335><s%> Shall Be Called <S%G2564><s%> For All <S%G3956><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Nations? <S%G1484><s%> <S%G5210><s%> But Ye <S%G1161><s%> Made <S%G4160><s%> It <S%G846><s%> A Den <S%G4693><s%> Of Robbers. <S%G3027><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Heard It <S%G191><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Scribes <S%G1122><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Chief Priests, <S%G749><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> They Sought <S%G2212><s%> How <S%G4459><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> They Shall Destroy : <S%G622><s%> <S%G5399><s%> For They Feared <S%G1063><s%> Him, <S%G846><s%> Because <S%G3754><s%> All <S%G3956><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Crowd <S%G3793><s%> Were Astonished <S%G1605><s%> At <S%G1909><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G1322><s%> His Teaching. <S%G846><s%>
And <S%G2532><s%> When <S%G3753><s%> Evening <S%G3796><s%> Came <S%G1096><s%> He Went Forth <S%G1607><s%> Out Of <S%G1854><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> City. <S%G4172><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> In The Morning <S%G4404><s%> Passing By <S%G3899><s%> They Saw <S%G1492><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Fig Tree <S%G4808><s%> Dried Up <S%G3583><s%> From The <S%G1537><s%> Roots. <S%G4491><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Having Remembered <S%G363><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Peter <S%G4074><s%> Says <S%G3004><s%> To Him <S%G846><s%> Rabbi, <S%G4461><s%> See, <S%G1492><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Fig Tree <S%G4808><s%> Which <S%G3739><s%> Thou Cursedst <S%G2672><s%> Is Dried Up. <S%G3583><s%>
And <S%G2532><s%> Answering <S%G611><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Says <S%G3004><s%> To Them, <S%G846><s%> Have <S%G2192><s%> Faith <S%G4102><s%> In God. <S%G2316><s%>

<S%G281><s%> For Verily <S%G1063><s%> I Say <S%G3004><s%> To You, <S%G5213><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> <S%G3739><s%> Whoever <S%G302><s%> Shall Say <S%G2036><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3735><s%> To This Mountain, <S%G5129><s%> Be Thou Taken Away <S%G142><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Be Thou Cast <S%G906><s%> Into <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Sea, <S%G2281><s%> <S%G2532><s%> And <S%G3361><s%> Shall Not Doubt <S%G1252><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2588><s%> His Heart, <S%G846><s%> But <S%G235><s%> Shall Believe <S%G4100><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> What <S%G3739><s%> He Says <S%G3004><s%> Takes Place, <S%G1096><s%> There Shall Be <S%G2071><s%> <S%G846><s%> To Him <S%G3739><s%> Whatever <S%G1437><s%> He Shall Say. <S%G2036><s%>

<S%G1223><s%> For This Reason <S%G5124><s%> I Say <S%G3004><s%> To You, <S%G5213><s%> All Things <S%G3956><s%> <S%G3745><s%> Whatsoever <S%G302><s%> Praying <S%G4336><s%> Ye Ask, <S%G154><s%> Believe <S%G4100><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> Ye Receive, <S%G2983><s%> And They <S%G2532><s%> Shall Be <S%G2071><s%> To You. <S%G5213><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> When <S%G3752><s%> Ye May Stand <S%G4739><s%> Praying, <S%G4336><s%> Forgive <S%G863><s%> If <S%G1487><s%> Anything <S%G5100><s%> Ye Have <S%G2192><s%> Against <S%G2596><s%> Anyone, <S%G5100><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3962><s%> Your Father <S%G5216><s%> Who Is <S%G3588><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Heavens <S%G3772><s%> May Forgive <S%G863><s%> You <S%G5213><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Offences <S%G3900><s%> Your. <S%G5216><s%>

<S%G1487><s%> But If <S%G1161><s%> Ye <S%G5210><s%> <S%G3756><s%>, Forgive Not, <S%G863><s%> Neither <S%G3761><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3962><s%> Your Father <S%G5216><s%> Who Is <S%G3588><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Heavens <S%G3772><s%> Will Forgive <S%G863><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3900><s%> Your Offences. <S%G5216><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> They Come <S%G2064><s%> Again <S%G3825><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> Jerusalem. <S%G2414><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Temple <S%G2411><s%> <S%G4043><s%> As He Is Walking <S%G846><s%> Come <S%G2064><s%> To <S%G4314><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Chief Priests <S%G749><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Scribes <S%G1122><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Elders, <S%G4245><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> They Say <S%G3004><s%> To Him, <S%G846><s%> By <S%G1722><s%> What <S%G4169><s%> Authority <S%G1849><s%> These Things <S%G5023><s%> Doest Thou? <S%G4160><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Who <S%G5101><s%> Thee <S%G4671><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Authority <S%G1849><s%> This <S%G3778><s%> Gave, <S%G1325><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> These Things <S%G5023><s%> Thou Shouldest Do? <S%G4160><s%>

<S%G3588><s%> And <S%G1161><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Answering <S%G611><s%> Said <S%G2036><s%> To Them, <S%G846><s%> Will Ask <S%G1905><s%> You <S%G5209><s%> I Also <S%G2504><s%> One <S%G1520><s%> Thing, <S%G3056><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Answer <S%G611><s%> Me, <S%G3427><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> I Will Tell <S%G2046><s%> You <S%G5213><s%> By <S%G1722><s%> What <S%G4169><s%> Authority <S%G1849><s%> These Things <S%G5023><s%> I Do : <S%G4160><s%>

The <S%G3588><s%> Baptism <S%G908><s%> Of John <S%G2491><s%> From <S%G1537><s%> Heaven <S%G3772><s%> Was It <S%G2258><s%> Or <S%G2228><s%> From <S%G1537><s%> Men? <S%G444><s%> Answer <S%G611><s%> Me. <S%G3427><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> They Reasoned <S%G3049><s%> With <S%G4314><s%> Themselves, <S%G1438><s%> Saying, <S%G3004><s%> If <S%G1437><s%> We Should Say, <S%G2036><s%> From <S%G1537><s%> Heaven, <S%G3772><s%> He Will Say, <S%G2046><s%> <S%G1223><s%> <S%G5101><s%> Then <S%G3767><s%> <S%G3756><s%> Did Ye Not Believe <S%G4100><s%> Him? <S%G846><s%>

' But <S%G235><s%> If <S%G1437><s%> We Should Say, <S%G2036><s%> From <S%G1537><s%> Men, <S%G444><s%> They Feared <S%G5399><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> People; <S%G2992><s%> <S%G537><s%> For All <S%G1063><s%> Held <S%G2192><s%> <S%G3588><s%> John <S%G2491><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> Indeed <S%G3689><s%> A Prophet <S%G4396><s%> He Was. <S%G2258><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Answering <S%G611><s%> They Say <S%G3004><s%> <S%G3588><s%> To Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> <S%G3756><s%> We Know Not. <S%G1492><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Answering <S%G611><s%> Says <S%G3004><s%> To Them, <S%G846><s%> Neither <S%G3761><s%> I 1473 P-1NS Tell 3004 V-PAI-1S You 5213 P-2DP By 1722 PREP What 4169 I-DSF Authority 1849 N-DSF These Things 5023 D-APN I Do. 4160 V-PAI-1S
